attributes.action: Would like the Government to agree and approve Cornwall Council's decision approving the planning application for 20 Wind Turbines at Davidstow Wood, near Camelford Cornwall.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Last October Cornwall Council approved the planning application for 20 Wind Turbines to be placed at Davidstow Wood, Cornwall. The area is an appropriate enviroment for the generation of wind power which is a much needed resource if the UK is to meet or get below its carbon footprint.
